heroContent.heading: Finally, A Modern Content Management System
heroContent.content: Contentstack brings business and technology teams together to deliver personalized, omnichannel digital experiences.

whySection.title: Idea-to-Deployment in Record Time
whySection.content: Accelerate the delivery of digital content, sites, and apps to bring new experiences to life in days, not months, with a modern CMS.

whySection.title: Improve ROI and ‘Return on Experience’
whySection.content: Reap greater returns on investments – both past and future – in digital content and digital experiences.

whySection.title: Better Collaboration, Better Control
whySection.content: Bring business and technology teams into harmony with our headless CMS, and unleash the full potential of your marketers, editors, designers, and developers.
